```
% file /Applications/MLwiN/*
/Applications/MLwiN/libmln.dylib: Mach-O universal binary with 2 architectures: [x86_64:Mach-O 64-bit dynamically linked shared library x86_64] [arm64]
/Applications/MLwiN/libmln.dylib (for architecture x86_64):	Mach-O 64-bit dynamically linked shared library x86_64
/Applications/MLwiN/libmln.dylib (for architecture arm64):	Mach-O 64-bit dynamically linked shared library arm64
/Applications/MLwiN/mlnscript:    Mach-O universal binary with 2 architectures: [x86_64:Mach-O 64-bit executable x86_64] [arm64:Mach-O 64-bit executable arm64]
/Applications/MLwiN/mlnscript (for architecture x86_64):	Mach-O 64-bit executable x86_64
/Applications/MLwiN/mlnscript (for architecture arm64):	Mach-O 64-bit executable arm64
```

```
% lipo -archs /Applications/MLwiN/mlnscript
x86_64 arm64
% lipo -archs /Applications/MLwiN/libmln.dylib
x86_64 arm64
```

## Install R2MLwiN

```r
install.packages("R2MLwiN")
```
